title: Que load for ARAM froze and I can't make or join any game modes at all and there's no reconnect
body: Riot staff can undo penalties that aren't my fault right???? E.g this or fake account trolls making fake reports  https://ibb.co/BttFPTh https://ibb.co/s50hqMr https://ibb.co/TYmLX4g https://ibb.co/p4t2drs AAAAAAAAND nope again https://ibb.co/VQ3P6zj IS ANYBODY ELSE GETTING THIS???

replies.body: Looks like you got struck by a ghost game after the queue issues. You weren't the only one either. They pretty much resolve themselves within 4 hours, so if you're still having trouble, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=611xMaaF,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-05-11T03:32:21.734+0000)
>
> Looks like you got struck by a ghost game after the queue issues. You weren't the only one either. They pretty much resolve themselves within 4 hours, so if you're still having trouble, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

thanks
Currently happening with Blind Pick/Ranked/ARAM. All of them give me an Attempt Failed....
